questions: Q. 1. Who is the author of the ‘Jungle Book’ ? [Board Term I, 2015 DDE-2015, Set-E]
Q. 2. Name the novel written by Daniel Defoe,  [Board Term 1, DDE-2015, Set-M]
Q. 3. Which problem of the society was focused in the novel ‘Hard Times’ written by Charles Dickens ?

Q. 5. Who wrote ‘Pickwick Papers’, the first serialised novel ?
Q. 6. Which book was written with adolescent girls in mind ?     1 mark each
